thread.title: Family and friends farewell Bliss N Eso stuntman | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Family and friends farewell Bliss N Eso stuntman | Daily Mail Online

author: Cameron Phelps For Daily Mail Australia
title: Family and friends farewell Bliss N Eso stuntman | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Family and friends perform emotional haka to farewell Bliss N Eso stuntman as his casket is lowered into the ground almost three weeks after he was ‘fatally shot with a blank’ on set of music video Mourners have farewelled the stuntman who while filming a music video for hip hop group Bliss n Eso Johann Ofner, 28, killed in central Brisbane in January after being fatally struck with a blank round Mr Ofner's funeral was held at the Sacred Heart Church in Clear Island Waters on Saturday Family and friends performed an emotional haka as his coffin was lowered into the ground Published: 02:26 GMT, 11 February 2017 | Updated: 07:08 GMT, 11 February 2017 288 shares
